io.radar.sdk.model

Class RadarContext

  • io.radar.sdk.model.RadarContext

  • public class RadarContext

    The context for a location.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      RadarContext(RadarGeofence[] geofences, RadarPlace place, RadarRegion country, RadarRegion state, RadarRegion dma, RadarRegion postalCode)
      The context for a location.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      RadarRegion getCountry()
      The country of the location.
      RadarRegion getDma()
      The designated market area
      RadarGeofence[] getGeofences()
      An array of the geofences for the location.

      The place for the location.

      The postal code of the location.

    • Constructor Detail

      • RadarContext

        public RadarContext(RadarGeofence[] geofences,
                    RadarPlace place,
                    RadarRegion country,
                    RadarRegion state,
                    RadarRegion dma,
                    RadarRegion postalCode)

        The context for a location.

        Parameters:
        geofences - An array of the geofences for the location. May be empty if the location is not in any geofences. See https://radar.io/documentation/geofences.
        place - The place for the location. May be null if the location is not at a place or if Places is not enabled. See https://radar.io/documentation/places.
        country - The country of the location. May be null if country is not available or if Regions is not enabled. See https://radar.io/documentation/regions.
        state - The state of the location. May be null if state is not available or if Regions is not enabled. See https://radar.io/documentation/regions.
        dma - The designated market area (DMA) of the location. May be null if DMA is not available or if Regions is not enabled. See https://radar.io/documentation/regions.
        postalCode - The postal code of the location. May be null if postal code is not available or if Regions is not enabled. See https://radar.io/documentation/regions.

    • Method Detail

      • getGeofences

        public RadarGeofence[] getGeofences()

        An array of the geofences for the location.

        May be empty if the location is not in any geofences. See https://radar.io/documentation/geofences.

        See Also:
        https://radar.io/documentation/geofences

      • getPlace

        public RadarPlace getPlace()

        The place for the location.

        May be null if the location is not at a place or if Places is not enabled. See https://radar.io/documentation/places.

        See Also:
        https://radar.io/documentation/places

      • getCountry

        public RadarRegion getCountry()

        The country of the location.

        May be null if country is not available or if Regions is not enabled. See https://radar.io/documentation/regions.

        See Also:
        https://radar.io/documentation/regions

      • getState

        public RadarRegion getState()

        The state of the location.

        May be null if state is not available or if Regions is not enabled. See https://radar.io/documentation/regions.

        See Also:
        https://radar.io/documentation/regions

      • getDma

        public RadarRegion getDma()

        The designated market area

        (DMA) of the location. May be null if DMA is not available or if Regions is not enabled. See https://radar.io/documentation/regions.

        See Also:
        https://radar.io/documentation/regions

      • getPostalCode

        public RadarRegion getPostalCode()

        The postal code of the location.

        May be null if postal code is not available or if Regions is not enabled. See https://radar.io/documentation/regions.

        See Also:
        https://radar.io/documentation/regions
